title: Exiled: Autumn's Peril
description: Book One in the Chronicles of Caleath. Science fiction Fantasy Best Seller. Available from Amazon for a short time at $2.99Exiled and driven by guilt and vengeance, Caleath, adept in virtual reality games, finds himself on a world where magic rules. Assassins hunt him, ghosts haunt his nights, a sorcerer covets his knowledge and a beautiful hostage complicates his escape.
author: Rosalie Skinner
